video_prompt: A pale figure in flowing robes dips a foot into tranquil water, creating subtle ripples as their form shifts. Their long hair sways gently around a bowed head, altering their pensive expression. The background subtly darkens and lightens, hinting at a changing sky.
image_prompt: Generate a contemplative digital painting of a pale-skinned figure in flowing white robes, seated on a mossy rock by dark, still water. Her long white hair blends with her robes as she gazes downwards. Her right foot is submerged, creating ripples, while her left hovers above the water. The background features shadowy trees and hints of autumnal foliage. Use a cool color palette of white, grey, deep blues, and greens to create an ethereal and somber atmosphere. Ignore all text elements.
refined_video_prompt: A foot's descent into water generates expanding ripples. The figure's form subtly shifts, robes gently swaying. Long hair drifts, revealing and then obscuring a head that dips slightly, subtly altering a pensive expression. The background continuously transitions through darkening and lightening tones, reflecting a dynamic sky.
